titleStmt.title: A guide to young communicants: or, The whole duty of the sacrament fitted for those that desire to be worthy receivers of the Lords Supper: with suitable prayers, for morning and evening. Also directions for a holy living and dying. A dialogue between a divine and a beggar. And a description of Christ's person when on earth. To which is added, Bishop Usher's prophecy.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for G. C. at the Ring in Little-Britain,

notesStmt.note: Note on verso of title page reads in part: "was wrote (as I was inform'd by Dr. J. Bishop of L-n." Possibly written by Dr. James Gardiner, who was Bishop of Lincoln, 1695-1705.
Date of publication conjectured by Wing.
Includes a brief account of the Spanish Armada.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
